content: DBS Multiplier Investments Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Apr 2019I have a POSB savings acc & DBS multiplier acc. My CDP account is linked to my POSB acc. If my dividends payout is credited to that this acc, will it unlock the Multiplier investment category?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 21 Apr 2019Yes but you must remember that int is paid only based on the money in multiplier0 comments0

TWTay WenHaoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 20 Apr 2019Yes it'll. Tried and proven. The good thing about multiplier is that the conditions can be met thru different accounts.However do note that the additional interest is only paid on the multiplier account itself thus i put all my money there to get the extra interest. (E.g. Transfering the dividends from POSB to Multiplier as soon as its credited)0 comments0
